title: Proteomic Analysis of Right Ventricular Hypertrophy in Experimental Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension and the Impact of Therapeutic Intervention
details: S Cantoni, B Pioselli, M Cont, ML Faietti, F Pastore… - … FOR GOLD:-OMICS …, 2024
abstract: BACKGROUND AND RATIONALE. In pulmonary hypertension (PH), the right ventricular (RV) failure is the main cause of a poor prognosis and currently represents a major unmet medical need. In SU5416/Chronic Hypoxia (SUHx) …
